message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13000.  This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand that $13000 is still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer $12500. This is the highest I can go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
